block.p: American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Placed RHP Scott Williamson on the 15-day DL. Recalled RHP Jim Johnson from Norfolk (IL). KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Recalled RHP Brian Bannister from Omaha (PCL). Optioned LHP Neal Musser to Omaha. YANKEES--Activated RHP Chien-Ming Wang from the 15-day DL. Optioned OF Kevin Thompson to Scranton/Wilkes-Barre (IL). TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Placed 3B Akinori Iwamura on the 15-day DL. Recalled INF Jorge Cantu from Durham (IL).
National League COLORADO ROCKIES--Placed RHP LaTroy Hawkins on the 15-day DL, retroactive to April 21. Activated LHP Tom Martin from the 15-day DL.
SEATTLE SUPERSONICS--Fired Bob Hill, coach, and Rick Sund, general manager.

CINCINNATI BENGALS--Signed LB Caleb Miller to a one-year contract. INDIANAPOLIS COLTS--Signed DE Josh Thomas to a one-year contract. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Named Bobby Jackson running backs coach. NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS--Signed CB Tory James.
ATLANTA THRASHERS--Announced the retirement of RW Scott Mellanby. ST. LOUIS BLUES--Re-signed C Trent Whitfield.

GEORGIA TECH--Announced freshman F Thaddeus Young will make himself available for the NBA draft. LOUISVILLE--Announced sophomore G Reginald Delk will transfer from Mississippi State. OKLAHOMA--Announced freshman G Bobby Maze will not return to the team next season. ORAL ROBERTS--Named Conley Clarke director of operations. RIDER--Named Lynn Milligan women's basketball coach. TEXAS A&M--Announced junior F Joseph Jones will make himself available for the NBA draft. VIRGINIA--Announced junior G Sean Singletary will make himself available for the NBA draft. VMI--Announced junior F Reggie Williams will make himself available for the NBA draft.

American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Placed RHP Scott Williamson on the 15-day DL. Recalled RHP Jim Johnson from Norfolk (IL). KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Recalled RHP Brian Bannister from Omaha (PCL).
